alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:44PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette and southern Taylor Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1044 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Perry to 30 miles west of Steinhatchee to 34 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pinland, Fish Creek, Jug Island, Howell Place, Carbur, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Foley, Salem, Blue Springs, Athena, Cedar Island, Bucell Junction and Clara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
